title: Bownet Portable Soccer Goal Net (6' x 12') Quick Setup - Durable Powder-Coated Steel Frame - Indoor Outdoor - Travel Bag Included - Practice Nets for Kids, Youth and Adults. Great Kids Soccer Goal
features: Goal is perfect for backyard play, schools, and team practices
Bownet's Energy Absorption System diffuses ball energy through the soccer net to extend its lifespan
BOW poles and powder coated telescoping frame distributes soccer goals weight across the bottom base
Goal sets up in 80 seconds without the use of tools.One of the best soccer goals for backyard.
Includes portable soccer goals soccer nets, steel frame,composite BOW poles,stakes, and roller case.
description: Set up a game anywhere, anytime with the Bownet 6' x 12' Portable Soccer Goal. Reliability, portability and strength make Bownet goals the resonated training and game goals among coaches and players worldwide. Bownet's E.A.S. technology (Energy Absorption System) helps reduce stress and tension on the netting, extend the lifespan of the net, create a more balanced goal, and add flexibility and stability upon impact. The original BOW-poles and rigid steel frame are engineered to distribute goal weight across the bottom base. Leave more time to play with a goal that sets up in 160 seconds without the use of tools, guide wires, or heavy steel crossbars reducing risk of injury during game and practice. The goal has rubber non-marking feet to help maintain stance and traction indoor and outdoor. It can be easily moved across a field with the removal of the secured ground stakes. When the game is over, collapse the goal and place into the provided manageable roller case for easy portability and storage. One year limited manufacturer warranty available. Play Anywhere, Play Now, Play Bownet!

With this this portable, easy-to-set-up soccer net, your can have your pick-up game going in less than two minutes. The folding indoor/outdoor net sets up that quickly -- with no screws, snaps, or tools required -- and it's lightweight at just 23 pounds. Non-marking rubber feet mean you can use it indoors when the weather turns nasty, while UV protective coating ensures years of reliable outdoor use, as well. Rigid steel and fiberglass pole construction is sturdy enough to handle whatever punishment you dish out, and a convenient carry bag is also included.
